text: Waterloo may refer to: ==Belgium== * The Battle of Waterloo, Napoleon's last major battle * Waterloo, Belgium – A municipality in Belgium * Chaussée de Waterloo - A street in Belgium ==North America== * Waterloo, Illinois – A municipality in Illinois, United States of America * Waterloo, Iowa – A municipality in Iowa, United States of America * Waterloo (town), New York – A town in New York, United States of America ** Waterloo (village), New York – A village inside the town of Waterloo * Waterloo, Ontario – A municipality in Ontario, Canada ==United Kingdom== * Waterloo Bridge - a bridge in London * Waterloo station - a railway station in London
title: Waterloo
